events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to return the product because it does not meet my expectations and I would like a refund.
System has classified this customer issue under the Refund cluster based on keywords like return and refund.
An agent named Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unopened and in its original packaging?
My order number is 123456789, and I have not opened the product. It is still sealed in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process. Please send the product back to us using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for your help. I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label for the return.
We consider your refund request resolved. Once we receive the returned product, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have returned the product. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Your refund case has been closed successfully. Thank you for your cooperation and please contact us anytime if you have more questions.
We just sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on our support service regarding your refund process.
